content.rendered: The MPPT (Maximum Power Point Tracking) charger controller used for commonly solar systems to maximize power extraction under all condition. It has charge battery through or using solar panel. Leons Charge controller based on Bluetooth and GSM wireless monitoring with up to >90% efficiency. It equipped with EEPROM for data saving and LCD display for all parameter indicators.
